header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 315-35zr17 drivers
Consistently rated as excellent by 315-35zr17 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 315/35ZR17 Tire Size 
315/55ZR17 tires are specialized to deliver great performance and are made for popular 80s and 90s sports cars like Chevrolet Corvette. The ‘ZR’ mentioned in this size means that the tire is safe to run at a speed above 149 mph (though, drivers should always make sure that they’re following posted speed limits). 315/35ZR17 tires are offered in Drag Racing, All-Season, Racing, and Ultra-High-Performance (UHP) tire categories to help drivers bring out the performance side of their ride.

Drag racing and competition tires often have a smooth tread and are used specifically for drag racing purposes. To provide the largest possible contact patch and maximum dry traction, these tires are not offered with any grooves or tread blocks. Check out the [Nitto NT555RII](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/nt555rii), BFGoodrich g-Force R1, and Mickey Thompson ET Street Radial if you need a set of 315/35ZR17 sized drag racing or competition tires to enjoy extreme throttles at racing events.   

All-season tires assure year-round traction and perform adequately in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. These tires are good for those who wish to use just one set of tires throughout the year. Consider buying the[Toyo Extensa HP II](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/extensa-hp-ii) or Sumitomo HTR Z if you need a 315/35ZR17 sized all-season tire for your car.

Ultra-high-performance (UHP) tires offer sporty handling and quick acceleration in warm weather and are most commonly seen attached to sport and supercars. Have a look at the [Nitto NT555 G2](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/nt555-g2) and Michelin Pilot Sport All Season 4if you need an ultra-high-performance tire for impeccable rides.

Whether you need a drag racing, all-season, ultra-high-performance, or any other type of tire for your Chevrolet Corvette or some other car, SimpleTire offers you a wide range of 315/35ZR17 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
